messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] how to handle haters- presentation
messages.msgSnippet: -=- I thought it might be a nice read for those of you who often get the whole sh*tload of haters all over them.
messages.messageBody:
-=- I thought it might be a nice read for those of you who often get
the whole sh*tload of haters all over them.

http://mashable.com/2010/04/29/deal-with-haters-tim-ferriss/-=-

Thanks for that, Susanne. I've considered all the elements of that at
one time or another but it was really soothing to read that whole long
list at a time when I'm not feeling that "JEEZ THE WORLD IS STUPID!"
feeling because people are burying homeschoolers, and unschoolers, and
sometimes particularly me, in a flood of muddy crud.

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: how to handle haters- presentation
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, It s been a few weeks since the GMA show aired, and all the spin off it created has most likely cooled down a bit, I guess. But I came across a
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

It's been a few weeks since the GMA show aired, and all the spin off it created has most likely cooled down a bit, I guess. But I came across a presentation by Tim Ferris (author of the awesome 4-hour workweek) on how to handle haters, and I thought it might be a nice read for those of you who often get the whole sh*tload of haters all over them.

http://mashable.com/2010/04/29/deal-with-haters-tim-ferriss/


Bye, Susanne (the netherlands)
